questions.question: This arc focuses on the backstory of Sanji and his connections to the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a tyrannical Warlord of the Sea who manipulates strings. What is...?
This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
This ability, seen in the Wano arc, allows the user to transform into an ancient dragon. What is...?
questions.answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Kaido's Dragon

questions.question: This ability allows its user to swim through the ground as if it were water, used notably by a member of the Shichibukai. What is...?
This ability, used by a former Warlord of the Sea, allows the manipulation of shadows. What is...?
This character, the captain of the Heart Pirates and a key ally of the Straw Hat Pirates, is known for his surgical skills and the Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This character, a princess of the Fish-Man Island, has the ability to communicate with sea kings. Who is...?
This character, a key figure in the Wano Country arc, possesses the mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, Model: Nine-Tailed Fox. Who is...?
